headline: SBA Communications Corporation to Speak at the UBS Global Media and Communications Conference
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., November 24, 2025--SBA Communications Corporation (NASDAQ: SBAC) ("SBA") announces that Marc Montagner, Chief Financial Officer, is scheduled to speak at the UBS Global Media and Communications Conference, Tuesday, December 9, 2025, at 2:15 PM (ET). The conference will be at the UBS Office on 11 Madison Avenue in New York. The audio presentation for SBA can be accessed by visiting www.sbasite.com.
